languages.text: Все шаттлы уничтожены, вероятность успешной эвакуации Лорд-капитана отсутствует. Рекомендовано провести перезарядку всего доступного оружия и приготовиться к последней схватке с превосходящими силами противника.

All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.
languages.original_text: Все шаттлы уничтожены, вероятность успешной эвакуации Лорд-капитана отсутствует. Рекомендовано провести перезарядку всего доступного оружия и приготовиться к последней схватке с превосходящими силами противника.

traits.locale_text: All shuttles have been destroyed: probability of Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make the last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

languages.text: Alle Shuttles wurden zerstört. Die Wahrscheinlichkeit einer Evakuierung des Lord Captain beträgt null. Es wäre empfehlenswert, alle verfügbaren Waffen nachzuladen und sich auf ein letztes Gefecht gegen die feindlichen Truppen vorzubereiten, die deutlich in der Überzahl sind.
languages.original_text: All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

traits.locale_text: Alle Shuttles wurden zerstört. Die Wahrscheinlichkeit einer Evakuierung des Lord Captain beträgt null. Es wäre empfehlenswert, alle verfügbaren Waffen nachzuladen und sich auf ein letztes Gefecht gegen die feindlichen Truppen vorzubereiten, die deutlich in der Überzahl sind.

languages.text: Toutes les navettes ont été détruites : {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'a plus la moindre chance de quitter la planète. Il est fortement recommandé de recharger toutes les armes disponibles et de se préparer à livrer un baroud d'honneur contre des forces ennemies à la supériorité écrasante.
languages.original_text: All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

traits.locale_text: Toutes les navettes ont été détruites : {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} n'a plus la moindre chance de quitter la planète. Il est fortement recommandé de recharger toutes les armes disponibles et de se préparer à livrer un baroud d'honneur contre des forces ennemies à la supériorité écrasante.

languages.text: シャトルはすべて破壊された。ロード・キャプテンを救出できる確率はゼロだ。推奨される行動は、利用できるすべての武器を再装填し、圧倒的な敵軍に対して最後の抵抗の準備をすることだ。
languages.original_text: All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

traits.locale_text: シャトルはすべて破壊された。ロード・キャプテンを救出できる確率はゼロだ。推奨される行動は、利用できるすべての武器を再装填し、圧倒的な敵軍に対して最後の抵抗の準備をすることだ。

languages.text: Todas las lanzaderas han sido destruidas. La probabilidad de extraer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán es cero. El plan recomendado es recargar todas las armas disponibles y disponerse a una batalla final contra fuerzas abrumadoras enemigas.
languages.original_text: All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

traits.locale_text: Todas las lanzaderas han sido destruidas. La probabilidad de extraer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán es cero. El plan recomendado es recargar todas las armas disponibles y disponerse a una batalla final contra fuerzas abrumadoras enemigas.

languages.text: 所有的穿梭机都被摧毁了，领主舰长已经没有办法离开这个地方了。目前建议的行动方针是：准备好所有还能用的武器，面对势不可挡的敌人，发起最后的反抗。
languages.original_text: All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

traits.locale_text: 所有的穿梭机都被摧毁了，领主舰长已经没有办法离开这个地方了。目前建议的行动方针是：准备好所有还能用的武器，面对势不可挡的敌人，发起最后的反抗。

languages.text: Tüm mekikler harap durumda. Lord Kaptan'ın gezegeni terk etme ihtimali sıfır. Mevcut tüm silahları doldurmak ve sayıca üstün düşman kuvvetlerine karşı son bir direnişe kalkışmak en doğru hareket olur.
languages.original_text: All the shuttles have been destroyed: the probability of the Lord Captain's extraction is zero. The recommended course of action is to reload all available weaponry and prepare to make a last stand against the overwhelming enemy forces.

traits.locale_text: Tüm mekikler harap durumda. Lord Kaptan'ın gezegeni terk etme ihtimali sıfır. Mevcut tüm silahları doldurmak ve sayıca üstün düşman kuvvetlerine karşı son bir direnişe kalkışmak en doğru hareket olur.
